title: briefUpdatesHealthOffshootNL
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesHealthOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: Wildfire smoke is killing Americans. A new study quantifies how much
items.description: More intense future wildfires, fueled by further climate change, could lead to 70,000 deaths from smoke exposure a year, according to a new study.
